name: HELLFEST
description:
THIS IS AN ONLINE GAME, TESTERS MUST CONTACT THE DEVS SO WE CAN LAUNCH THE SERVERS FOR YOU TO PLAY.

Demons and Eternally damned! It's a scorching hot day in HELL with a hundred percent chance of BLOODSHED and CARNAGE!

Bare witness to the GREATEST tournament of our unholy realm! Devils and Demons alike you have the chance; Rip, tear and crush your way to INFINITE GLORY!

This is HELLFEST!

HELLFEST is a PvP Tournament style game set in HELL! You play as one of many demonic figures against other players and fight your way to the top! But you are not alone! The announcers are with you the whole way to cheer and mock your performance!
